entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
